page.title: 10Newspapers - Leeswood area
page.content: This area is well-served by the media,including five newspapers. { The Leeswood & District News}comes out monthly and covers the last months sport & news like cricket and bowls. { The Evening Leader}has a circulation of 30 000 and comes out five times a week.It is an evening paper and is sent to all N.Wales and Chester. { The Chester Chronicle}comes out once a week and covers main school & club's doings and takes photographs of them in their work. {The Wrexham Leader}is just like the Chester Chronicle but covers another area. { The Daily Post}comes out six times a week;it has got news for Welsh and English readers with a good sports coverage.Its circulation is 209 000.
